title: 17 Best Watches for Men 2019
text:
These are all on Amazon, all under $150. Photo: Courtesy of the vendors

While poking around the bowels of Amazon, we noticed something slightly surprising — sprinkled among the site’s many, many men’s watches from brands you’ve never heard of were plenty of actually great timepieces, from known makers like Braun, Nixon, Timex, Skagen, and Daniel Wellington. The best part? Lots of them cost under $150. It’s true that people are less inclined to wear watches these days, but a lot of these watches are so fun — and affordable — that we think you might be convinced to go analog again (okay, there are a few digital watches here too, but you know what we mean).

Timex Weekender Watch, 38mm The military-style Timex Weekender is a classic at a great price. We like the rugged look of the olive nylon band and off-white dial, but there are plenty of other options, including one with Snoopy in a space suit. $31 at Amazon Buy $31 at Amazon Buy

Casio G-Shock Digital Watch $44 (was $70, now 37% off) This old-school Casio G-Shock is simple and durable, with plenty of throwback style. Plus, it’s much more low-profile than your typical G-Shock. $44 at Amazon Buy $44 at Amazon Buy

Timex Metropolitan Watch, 40mm With its black, genuine leather strap and silver dial, Timex’s Metropolitan watch makes for a sophisticated and surprisingly affordable timepiece. $54 at Amazon Buy $54 at Amazon Buy

Seiko Men’s SNK807 Seiko 5 Automatic Stainless Steel Watch With Blue Canvas Band A self-winding automatic watch at less than $70 is basically unheard of, and the brushed-steel casing and blue canvas band give this a refined-but-casual look. $67 at Amazon Buy $67 at Amazon Buy

Fossil The Minimalist Quart Stainless Steel Dress Watch, 44mm $73 (was $135, now 46% off) You can’t go wrong with with this elegant, stripped-down Fossil watch. The numberless black dial with white markings is sophisticated and still easy to read. $73 at Amazon Buy $73 at Amazon Buy

Stührling Original Men’s 122.33551 Classic Ascot Somerset Watch Black mesh metal and large gold numbers give this big Airplane Cockpit Energy. $90 at Amazon Buy $90 at Amazon Buy

Citizen Men’s BM8180-03E Eco-Drive Stainless Steel Watch With Green Canvas Band Another military-style watch, from the brand Citizen. The black dial and prominent markings give it the look of an expensive diver’s watch, while the olive canvas band makes it a little more understated. $94 at Amazon Buy $94 at Amazon Buy

Skagen Kristoffer Multifunction Stainless Steel Quartz Watch with Woven Fabric Band $97 (was $125, now 22% off) If you aren’t afraid of a little color, this multifunction quartz watch from Skagen is a lot of fun. $97 at Amazon Buy $97 at Amazon Buy

Braun Men’s BN0032WHSLMHG Classic Mesh Analog Display Japanese Quartz Silver Watch Regular readers will know we are big fans of a classic Dieter Rams Braun number, and this watch is no exception. The mesh metal band, white dial, and probably-Helvetica hour markers are all part of its iconic look. $105 at Amazon Buy $105 at Amazon Buy

Daniel Wellington Classic Black Sheffield, 40mm $114 (was $229, now 50% off) We’ve been seeing these minimalist Daniel Wellington watches everywhere (and not just on those subways that are plastered with the brand’s ads featuring Hailey Bieber and Odell Beckham Jr.). They’re popular for a reason: These sleek watches look like they could easily be ten times the price. $114 at Amazon Buy $114 at Amazon Buy

Swatch Metal Knit Quartz Resin Watch This one came to us via our Resident Cool Guy Chris Black, who says it’s “the perfect choice if you want something new and crushingly simple. A truly ‘less-is-more’ piece of wristwear, it says I am smart and successful, but don’t need a piece of high-end wristwear to prove it.” $120 at Amazon Buy $120 at Amazon Buy

Adidas Watches Archive M1 Stainless Steel Digital Watch For some reason, we’re really into vintage-looking digital watches right now, so here’s another from Adidas that feels almost “retro-future,” like something you’d see in Blade Runner. $130 at Amazon Buy $130 at Amazon Buy

Nautica Men’s N16695G NCT 17 Brushed Stainless Steel Watch With Brown Band The brown leather band, deep-blue dial, and multiple stopwatch dials give this a sporty — but still classic — look. $137 at Amazon Buy $137 at Amazon Buy

Projects Unisex Crossover 40mm Leather Band Watch Because you’re wondering: The second hand is yellow, the minute hand white, and the hour hand gray. Wear this watch and tell people you’re an architect or something. They’ll believe you. $145 at Amazon Buy $145 at Amazon Buy

Lacoste Men’s ‘12.12-TECH’ Quartz Plastic and Rubber Smart Watch Lacoste isn’t just for preps. Done in black with a textured rubber band, this watch is very stealth (with the exception of the green alligator logo, of course). $145 at Amazon Buy $145 at Amazon Buy

description: We rounded up the best $150-or-less watches for men on Amazon, including watches from Fossil, Nixon, and Daniel Wellington; watches with stainless-steel bands, canvas bands, quartz movement, and automatic movement; and some digital watches, too.
